attributes.action: hold a full public enquiry into the death of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We shall not deliberate on the background of the death of Baby P, as the reports speak for the matter. Given these dreadful circumstances, we petition for a public enquiry to be held such that the matter is discussed fully and transparently, and such that the public is able to see that government truly does make all efforts to prevent this indescribably awful act from being repeated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
